page.title: 06FARMING CONTINUED
page.content: MR Goldup looks after pigs.He has boars,Hampshires and Lambrace pigs.When they are born they weigh 3 lbs.They take 16 weeks to grow to 140 lbs. There are 40 race horses and they all go to races including 'THE DERBY'.They have stables for all of them and use up to 6000 bales of hay a year. PETTINGS COURT FARM GR 620 630 The farmers name is I.R.R.Stoneham.He owns 150 acres.Two people work on the farm at the moment but after September there will only be one.He average sallary is 82pounds per 40 hours.The farmer has owned the farm for 8 years. Although it has been in the family for a long time. The farm has 23 cows used for beef and 150 acres of wheat and barley and silage.The new buildings are 10 years old and the oldest are 18 years old.
